DOC.brief_summary: This study is to demonstrate the safety, tolerability, pharmakokinetic and pharmacodynamic effect of BAY63-2521 in patients with pulmonary hypertension and stable treatment of sildenafil 20 mg.
DOC.brief_title: Interaction Study in Patients With Pulmonary Hypertension and Stable Treatment of Sildenafil 20 mg TID
